summary: The module defines a pluggable data access layer for the Chainlit platform, offering an abstract interface for CRUD operations on core entities (users, threads, steps, elements, feedback) and concrete implementations for DynamoDB, Literal AI, and asynchronous SQLAlchemy. It also includes accessâ€‘control checks, utility helpers, and debugging support to ensure secure and consistent persistence across different storage backends.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, secure, and extensible backend for storing and managing conversational data, allowing the application to switch between various databases or services while maintaining a unified API for data operations.
